values: i love random phone calls. i have way too much homework to be on this thing. im just bored out of my mind with this anthro bs. my family is hilarious. alright im thinkin 28 days...it better snow and even if it doesnt...it'll still be perfect :)

only cause i had work and school all day. anddd because i want christmas to roll around more than anything...not just cause of christmas but because i need to get out of here. i leave the 26th...so thats 50-some days till im there. :) pretty much excited...cant even explain how much. this weekend was amazing...i loved gettin that trolley ride for free and having the creepiest taxi driver in the city of san diego..haha his name was probably rufi or somethin. i cant do math...or drive. we didnt buy a pumpkin this year...ehhh halloween just didnt phase me this year. doesnt feel like it at all. maybe because i live in california where is sunny...all the time. lovely. im talking 80 on halloween...chello? anyway i havent been on this thing since i got back from washington...i think. we got this 50 inch plasma...nice little addition to the family hanging over the fireplace and all. gap is alright. i bought a camera. im loving it. i did my hair in braids today. for the first time in about 5 years. its ya know...appealing...i guess. haha i look 7 so i think its okay. dayam...i go all out on these life-updaters. i miss you all...you know who you are. :)

today was school, first day. whateva. only gone through half of my classes. first day on da job too...haha im aright i guess, just bored. waitin to go to work cause theres nothing else better to do than sleep. i got no sleep last night because im so used to going to bed at 2 or 3 am and getting up at 12 everyday. grrr rarrrr

uh huuuh uu to be continued...I GUESS
haha

alright if i could jump to any month right now, id try december. tonight is pretty much the last summer night. im now a part of the gap inc...PFFFF i know school is gonna go by fa-hast cause this year is gonna be easssy. i had the best summer of life pretty much. 4 weeks total of vacation which is a beautiful thing because if i stayed in carlsbad for more than week straight, i dont know what i would do with myself. virginia was amazing and i would go back in a heart beat. washington...jeezee...going home is just the warmest feeling i can get. it feels so right. the best trip back to redmond ive ever had. now school starts in a day and im just ready to get it over with...haha. its alright. my school is a POC but what can ya do? the boy likes eatin through a straw. this month is gonna be supreme: license, school, new job. i want december. polar express comes out on dvd...haha and i need a little piece of home for christmas :) im goin alone this time around...it should be spectacular :) well for once im giddy and the vma's are fun to make fun of...but i know i like watchin it. haha peace and up and down.

ps. noodles and sauce and ohh those dinna rolls ;)
annnd...my room is almost done...:)

lovin all the way

i got a job today...the interview was hilarious because i was totally delirious and the lady still thought i was just great. i got about an hour and a half of sleep last night due to my favorite thing. its worth it :) haha, oh mahhhannn. i need a camera. mines broken. i also want winter break. shit. i love my family...they're hilarious. im lucky. hahaha...ohhh wow. so i go register at school with kage this morning and my ID card picture makes it look like i have some sort of disease with a mix of a brown lab. doggg. haha and i laughed so hard i almost died. go rent back to the future...no BUY it. im out of it. zspodgn.

its 1:40 am...hum...i didnt know you had "friends" on this thing. im pretty much talking to myself. greeattt...haha. im still lost/stuck. i feel helpless and crazy. i cant even put my situation into words of my own...its all up in my head jumpin around. not sure what to do...once again. i went to camp yesterday. haha...it was hilarious. dani came, all in good fun. dani and kyle are my californians. i dont even know what a person in calrsbad is called. calrsbadian? calrstonian? haha. i dont belong here. i figured out that this one song pretty much explains my life right now and i cant stop listening to it. i hadnt looked out my window for while until tonight...i wish i could see at least one star. its been overcast ever since a got home. it just makes me feel that much better. i cant sleep...but im hella tired. i cant stop thinking about it. WHY. why arie? no clue. it makes me crazy everyday. well. welllllllllll. psshh haha im so gone. i tried sleeping but...i cant. kept tossin and turnin. its way too hot in here for having the window open...i wanna sit on my roof. i cant...haha whateva whateva.

ps. i love you.

woooooowwww....never been this bored on a sunday night. or lonely. i got back from my home land a week ago from today. its not the same. i feel really out of place and i havent been myself lately. not sure what to do. school starts in 3 or 4 weeks. whatevaaa jeeeezee its hot. its been overcast for about a week...lovely. haha what a week. wellll i guess some of this will get better. im goin job hunting tomorrow...yes. and i get my license in 26 days, with no car. well semi-car...piece-a-crap. but hey ITS A CAR PFFFF haha well well. i cut my hair yesterday. it feel gooooood. :) im gettin a new camera soon which rocks my world because dropping my other one in front of the holocaust museum is just fabulous. psh...arie. well thats my little update...bored. 

p.s. take me north.

well...on saturday (july 16th) myself, dani, simon, and my fasha went to "comic con" san diego. we were hoping to see tenacious d at 6:30 but we decided to go for the whole day. dani and i were waiting for the d all day and finally around 5:15 we left "the simpsons" panel to get in line early. we went to the lower level and there was a HUGE line. we cut the line. haha anyway, we got in there (this room can hold 5000 people) and stood in the back. on the large monitor in the front of the room we saw peter jackson talking about his new movie "king kong" starring jack black and naomi watts. i happen to adore jack black and was very excited to see him proform with KG (kyle gass). me and dani decided to ask someone if the d would be on next. they relplied: "yes, but first is the "king kong" pannel. all of a sudden, we see adrian broddy, naomi watts, and JACK BLACK walk out on to the panel. me and dani get very excited and run to the front of the room only to be stopped by security. then, we sat behind a line of people waiting to ask the panel questions. a strange hispanic man approaches us and asked us to go up and ask jack to sing to us. soooo it was our turn to ask jack and he did...he sang to me and dani. seeing my face on those huge monitors made me want to RUN AWAY (haha) but we were so happy, we could not. the song he sang was very hilarious and will never be heard again. its called "KONG" and it goes a little something like this: "KKKKOOOONNNNNGGGGGG!!!! IN THE JUNGLE HE LIVES THAT IS WHERE HE BELONGSSSSS!!!" it was amazing. then i called simon with excitement and he said he saw us on the monitors. then we went to the middle area of the room and sat on the floor. we waited for the d to come on and got really crappy seats. it was so fabulous though. jabbles and rage kage were hilarious. all in all comin con was pretty boring but the end of the day is always exciting. and now i can say that jack black sang to me and it was the best day of my life. :)

im here and im loving it...melissa is da best ya know? live journal is crazy weird. ive had a blassssssst so far and im pretty sure ive only been here for 3 days. i leave for home on the 31st...i wanna stay but i cant. moving is hard. im becoming a "fresh prince of bel-air" fan. its quite hilarious. i love it here, and if you have the means, i highly suggested coming here...it is so choice. i miss my family and my two friends but its okayyyy. i want to come here over winter break...but next time hopefully the pilot wont point out things to me i already know of...aka mt. saint helens. hes like: "notice its partly gone? ha ha ha" i got a kick outta THAT ONE. haha today is our lazy day. i want to go to the park. shhhhwing.
